TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Ngudra-drekai, title = Ngudra-drekai, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ngudra-drekai} }

S.FORM: alang Ngudra-drekai (新富社區 Rukay 部落) ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Kingbong go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 113 buwan, 344 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 98% kyan ku 338 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 2% kyan ku 6 hi nya. rhzyal kki'an lingay na Ngudra-drekai ga Kaaluan ru Maljivel. rekisi qalang Ngudra-drekai ga pzyang qalang nqu drekai. kayal kyokay qalang Ngudra-drekai ga ungat kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Ngudra-drekai ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Ngodra-drekai (新富社區 Rokay 部落) ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Kingbong go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 113 bowan, 344 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 98% kyan ko 338 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 2% kyan ko 6 hi nya. rhzyal kki'an lingay na Ngodra-drekai ga Kaaloan ro Maljivel. rekisi qalang Ngodra-drekai ga pzyang qalang nqo drekai. kayal kyokay qalang Ngodra-drekai ga ongat kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Ngodra-drekai ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
